name: Mind Swap
description:
Professor Smith has finally invented the mind swapping machine.  The staff have spent the afternoon swapping minds with each other, experiencing what it is like to be someone else.  Unfortunately, they learn too late that there is a flaw in the machine.  Once two bodies have swapped minds, those same two bodies can never swap minds again.

Everything is a mess!  It is up to you to get all the minds back into the bodies they belong.

A puzzle game inspired by the Futurama episode "The Prisoner of Benda."    I created this game as an entry for SyntaxBomb's Retro Game Contest Retro Code Contest
